##Summary Information

Our data is downloaded from the website Kaggle, but the data origonally came from the [Ted Talks' wbsite](https://www.ted.com/talks). The data contains `r ted_talk_count` videos run from the start of the TED website until September 21st, 2017. Since that time the most viewed video has been `r most_viewed_video` by `r most_viewed_speaker` with `r most_views` total views.


```{r George Table}
summary(cars)
```
